requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: Basic ecological concepts, study of ecosystems and application of ecological principles to local and global environmental problems. This course does not fulfill requirements for the biology major. Four hours of lecture and one three-hour laboratory per week.
